original_text: Know then in your heart that, as a man disciplines his son, the Lord your God disciplines you.
korean_text: 너는 사람이 그 아들을 징계함 같이 네 하나님 여호와께서 너를 징계하시는 줄 마음에 생각하고

sentences.original_text: Know then in your heart that
as a man disciplines his son
the Lord your God disciplines you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 너를 징계하시는 것이니라
